tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE pharmaceutical_patent_litigation_history (
    patent_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    lawsuit_description TEXT,
    court_decision TEXT,
    settlement_amount DECIMAL,
    lawsuit_start_date DATE,
    lawsuit_end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE pharmaceutical_patent_litigation (
    patent_id INT,
    plaintiff VARCHAR(255),
    defendant VARCHAR(255),
    lawsuit_type VARCHAR(100),
    court_ruling VARCHAR(100),
    settlement_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE settlement_history (
    settlement_id INT,
    lawsuit_id INT,
    settlement_date DATE,
    amount_received DECIMAL(10, 2),
    attorney_fees DECIMAL(8, 2),
    plaintiff_share DECIMAL(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE court_rulings (
    ruling_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lawsuit_id INT,
    issuing_judge VARCHAR(255),
    ruling_description TEXT,
    ruling_date DATE
);
